name: activity-4--
description: | Method |       Path       |              Purpose               | | :----: | :--------------: | :--------------------------------: | |  GET   |        /         |             Home page              | |  GET   |     /places      |         Places index Page          | |  POST  |     /places      |          Create new place          | |  GET   |   /places/new    | Form Page for creating a new place | |  GET   |   /places/:id    |  Details about a particular place  | |  PUT   |   /places/:id    |     Update a particular place      | |  GET   | /places/:id/edit |     editing an exisiting page      |
